channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- ControlLogix® 5570
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- ControlLogix® 5570

item.title: CVE-2024-21916|2024-01-31T18:28:59.715Z -- Rockwell Automation -- ControlLogix® 5570
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in specific Rockwell Automation ControlLogix ang GuardLogix controllers. If exploited, the product could potentially experience a major nonrecoverable fault (MNRF). The device will restart itself to recover from the MNRF.
